devdoc.details: Decentralized lending and borrowing protocol on Intuition testnet

AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params._borrowRate: Borrow interest rate in basis points
params._supplyRate: Supply interest rate in basis points

getBorrowPower(address).details: Get user's borrow power (maximum amount they can borrow)

getHealthFactor(address).details: Get user's health factor (collateral value / borrow value)

params._borrower: Address of the borrower to liquidate
params._tokenBorrowed: Token address of borrowed asset to repay
params._tokenCollateral: Token address of collateral to seize

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supply(address,uint256).details: Supply tokens to the lending pool

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: OracleLend

userdoc.notice: Allows users to supply assets to earn interest and borrow against collateral
